#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,i,temp;
	char c;
	char mat[1000];
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",&mat);
		for(i=0;mat[i]!='\0';i++)
		{
			if(mat[i]=='3')
			{printf(" "); i++;}
			else
			{
				if(mat[i]=='6' || mat[i]=='7' || mat[i]=='8')
				{
					temp = ((mat[i]-48)*10) + (mat[i+1]-48);
					printf("%c",temp);
					i++;
				}
				else
				{
					if(mat[i]=='9' && mat[i+1]=='0')
					{printf("Z"); i++;}
					else
					{
						if(mat[i]=='9')
						{
							temp = (mat[i]-48)*10 + (mat[i+1]-48);
							printf("%c",temp);
							i++;
						}
						else
						{
							temp = (mat[i]-48)*100 + (mat[i+1]-48)*10 + (mat[i+2]-48);
							printf("%c",temp);
							i+=2;
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
